summary: A hard-boiled, intergalactic policeman lands on Earth where he is only 12 inches tall.
cast: Tim Thomerson|Jackie Earle Haley|Kamala Lopez|Humberto Ortiz|Nicholas Guest|Judd Omen|Michael Halsey|Frank Doubleday|Frank Collison|Vincent Klyn|John Durbin|Merle Kennedy|Luis Contreras|Eugene Robert Glazer|Richard D'Sisto|John Eastman|Christian Guzek|Maria Strova|Samantha Phillips|Dyana Ortelli|Gary Krantz|Laurianne Jameson|Cody Burger|Jody Catlin|Todd Eckert|Mark Bringelson|Buddy Daniels Friedman|Albert Pyun
title: Dollman
